Image Super Resolution ISR Please upload the picture and adjust the resolution you need. width: Please upload the picture height: 1PX 3PX Original Tips Before using the image overcommitment service, you need to convert images into ARGB bitmaps. After the service processes the images, the ARGB bitmaps are output. In the 3x overcommitment scenario, the maximum size of the input image is 800 pixels x 800 pixels, and the minimum length of the input image must be greater than or equal to 64 pixels. In the 1X overcommitment scenario, the maximum size of the input image is 1024 pixels x 768 pixels or 768 pixels x 1024 pixels. The minimum length of the input image must be greater than or equal to 64 pixels. The image quality is not obvious when the input image is of good definition.
Text Image Super Resolution TISR Before using the text and image overcommitment service, you need to convert images into ARGB bitmaps. After the service processes the images, the ARGB bitmaps are output. Text image overcommitment supports only 3x overcommitment. The maximum size of the input image is 800 pixels x 800 pixels, and the minimum size of the long side is no less than 64 pixels. The image quality is not obvious when the input image is of good definition.
